Name : BRIAN MAGOSI

Country : South Africa


Message : Dear sir/madam,
I am inquiring about the availability of ethyl hexyl glycerine and the possibilities to supply in bulk.

Expecting your valuable reply at your earliest expediency.
Regards

Magosi Brian | Assistant Procurement Manager

STAX Sourcing Company.
